titleStmt.title: The art of memory, that otherwyse is called the Phenix A boke very behouefull and profytable to all professours of scyences. Grammaryens, rethoryciens dialectyke, legystes, phylosophres [and] theologiens.
Artificiosa memoria. English
titleStmt.author: Petrus, Ravennas, ca. 1448-1508 or 9.

titleStmt.title: The art of memory, that otherwyse is called the Phenix A boke very behouefull and profytable to all professours of scyences. Grammaryens, rethoryciens dialectyke, legystes, phylosophres [and] theologiens.
Artificiosa memoria. English

publicationStmt.publisher: In Fletestrete at the sygne of the George by Wyllyam Myddylton,

notesStmt.note: A translation, by Robert Copland, out of French into English, of: Petrus Ravennas. Artificiosa memoria.
Imprint from colophon; publication date suggested by STC.
Reproduction of the original in the Cambridge University Library.
